skills.name: Crushing Blow
skills.description: Smashes the enemy and inflicts Continuous Damage on the target for 2 turns with a 50% chance. The damage of this skill is proportionate to your MAX HP and this attack will increase your Attack Speed for 2 turns if it lands as a Critical Hit.

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skills.multiplier_formula: 1.1*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.18*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Meditate
skills.description: Recovers 40% of the MAX HP through meditation. This skill will heal the ally with the lowest HP ratio instead, if your HP is more than 50%.

skill_effect.name: Self-Heal
skill_effect.description: Heal that affects only the monster who cast the skill

skills.multiplier_formula: 0.4*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark> (Fixed)

skills.name: Trick of Fire
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a spell that summons the power of fire. This attack has a 75% chance to disturb the target's HP recovery for 2 turns. The damage of this skill is proportionate to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Disturb HP Recovery
skill_effect.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns

skills.multiplier_formula: 0.29*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>
